00340 /*  We keep various pieces of information about the file format in the PiMI resource.
00341     Here is the structure of that resource. */
00342 
00343 /******************************************************************************/
00344 
00349 
00350 
00351 
00368 #define PIFmtFileTypeProperty           0x666d5443  /* 'fmTC' <TypeCreatorPair> Default file type for file format. */
00369 
00376 #define PIReadTypesProperty             0x52645479  /* 'RdTy' <TypeCreatorPair []> File type info for file format plug-ins */
00377 
00386 #define PIFilteredTypesProperty         0x66667454  /* 'fftT' <TypeCreatorPair []> File types to filter for file format plug-ins */
00387 
00394 #define PIReadExtProperty               0x52644578  
00403 #define PIFilteredExtProperty           0x66667445  /* 'fftE' <OSType []> File types to filter for file format plug-ins */
00404 
00411 #define PIFmtFlagsProperty              0x666d7466  /* 'fmtf' <Set> Format flags */
00412 
00418 #define PIFmtHiddenFlagsProperty        0x666D6869  /* 'fmhi' Hidden read/write flags  */
00419 
00425 #define PIFmtICCFlagsProperty           0x666D6970  /* 'fmip' ICC profile flags. */
00426 
00432 #define PIFmtICCRequiredFlagsProperty   0x666D6972  /* 'fmir' ICC required profile flags.*/
00433 
00441 #define PIFmtMaxSizeProperty            0x6d78737a  /* 'mxsz' <Point> Max rows and cols supported by this format.   */
00442 
00454 #define PIFmtMaxChannelsProperty        0x6d786368  /* 'mxch' <int16 []> Max channels per mode for this format. */
00455 
00460 #define PIFmtFilePropertiesProperty     0x66667073  /* 'ffps' Supports formatSelectorGetFilePropertyValue selector. */
00461 
00466 #define PIFmtLosslessRotateProperty     0x666C6C72  /* 'fllr' Supports formatSelectorLosslessRotate selector. */
00467 
00472 #define PIFmtBulkSettingsProperty       0x66666273  /* 'ffbs' Supports formatSelectorBulkSettings selector.*/
00473 
00478 #define PIFmtPrimaryMetadataProperty    0x6666706d  /* 'ffpm' File format is primary metadata source.*/
00479 
00484 #define PIFmtPrimaryThumbnailProperty   0x66667074  /* 'ffpt' File format is primary thumbnail source. */
00485 
00490 #define PIFmtXMPReadProperty            0x786D7072  /* 'xmpr' Supports formatSelectorXMPRead selector.*/
00491 
00496 #define PIFmtXMPWriteProperty           0x786D7077  /* 'xmpw' Supports formatSelectorXMPWrite selector. */
00497 
00502 #define PIFmtQuickThumbExtractProperty  0x7174686D  /* 'qthm' Supports extractQuickThumbnail field. */
00503 
00508 #define PIFmtBulkOpenProperty           'ffbo'      /* 'ffbo' Supports formatSelectorBulkOpen selector. */
00509 
00514 #define PIFmtRawSettingsProperty        'rscp'      /* 'rscp' Supports settings copy/paste/etc selectors.*/
00515 
00520 #define PIFmtOpenWriteAccessProperty    'fowa'      /* 'fowa' Plug-in prefers write access when opening.*/
00521 
00526 #define PIFmtWarnIfOverriddenProperty   'fwio'      /* 'fwio' Warning if this plug-in is override by another. */
00527 
00532 #define PIFmtResourceThreadSafeProperty 'frts'      /* 'ft' Plug-in is resource fork thread safe. */
00533 
00534 #define PIFmtSupportsLayersProperty     'fmsl'      /* 'fmsl' plug-in supports layers */
00535 
00536 #define PIFmtSupportsLayersReadOnlyProperty 'slRO'  /* 'slRO' plug-in layer support is read-only */
00537 
00542

00544

00560 #define PIFmtPVRotateIsLosslessWithCallback 5   
00562     /* add values for other format file properties here */

00733 typedef struct FormatInfo
00734     {
00735 
00736     PlugInInfo  plugInInfo;             
00737     int16       typeCount;              
00738     int16       extensionCount;         
00739     Boolean     canRead;                
00740     Boolean     readsAllTypes;          
00741     Boolean     canWrite;               
00742     Boolean     canWriteIfRead;         
00743     Boolean     savesImageResources;    
00744     Boolean     padFlag;                
00745     int16       maxChannels [16];       
00746     int16       maxRows;                
00747     int16       maxCols;                
00748     OSType      fileType;               
00749     OSType      creatorType;            
00750     OSType      typeList [1];           
00752     }
00753 FormatInfo;
00754 
00755 /******************************************************************************/
00756 /* turn off the byte align pragma back to its original state; only for Borland C */
00757 #if defined(__BORLANDC__)
00758 #pragma option -a.
00759 #endif
00760 
00761 /* Pragma to turn off align structures for Microsoft C */
00762 #if WIN32
00763 #pragma pack(pop)
00764 #endif

00782 #define formatBadParameters     -30500  
00784 #define formatCannotRead        -30501  
00786 #define formatSkipFile          -30502  
00788 #define formatPasswordProtected -30503  
00789 #define formatUnsupportedRaw    -30504  
00791 #define formatUnsupportedDNG    -30505  
00795 
00796 #if WIN32
00797 #pragma pack(push,4)
00798 #endif
00799 
00807 typedef struct FormatRecord
00808     {
00809 
00810     int32               serialNumber;   
00817     TestAbortProc       abortProc;      
00819     ProgressProc        progressProc;   
00821     int32               maxData;        
00829     int32               minDataBytes;   
00833     int32               maxDataBytes;   
00838     int32               minRsrcBytes;   
00841     int32               maxRsrcBytes;   
00845     //64bits - sometimes we put ptr values into these fields. They need to be the right size
00846     intptr_t            dataFork;       
00851     intptr_t            rsrcFork;       
00856 #if __LP64__
00857     FSSpec *            unusedFileSpec; 
00858 #else
00859     FSSpec *            fileSpec;       
00864 #endif
00865 
00866     int16               imageMode;      
00874     Point               imageSize;      
00876     int16               depth;          
00880     int16               planes;         
00892     Fixed               imageHRes;      
00900     Fixed               imageVRes;      
00913     LookUpTable         redLUT;         
00920     LookUpTable         greenLUT;       
00927     LookUpTable         blueLUT;        
00935     void *              data;           
00942     Rect                theRect;        
00944     int16               loPlane;        
00949     int16               hiPlane;        
00954     int16               colBytes;       
00958     int32               rowBytes;       
00960     int32               planeBytes;     
00965     PlaneMap            planeMap;       
00976     Boolean             canTranspose;   
00980     Boolean             needTranspose;  
00985     OSType              hostSig;        
00987     HostProc            hostProc;       
00992     int16               hostModes;      
00998     Handle              revertInfo;     
01022     NewPIHandleProc     hostNewHdl;     
01023     DisposePIHandleProc hostDisposeHdl; 
01025     Handle              imageRsrcData;  
01046     int32               imageRsrcSize;  
01050     PlugInMonitor       monitor;        
01052     void *              platformData;   
01055     BufferProcs *       bufferProcs;    
01060     ResourceProcs *     resourceProcs;  
01064     ProcessEventProc    processEvent;   
01067     DisplayPixelsProc   displayPixels;  
01070     HandleProcs         *handleProcs;   
01074 
01075 
01076     OSType              fileType;       
01078     ColorServicesProc   colorServices;  
01081     AdvanceStateProc    advanceState;

01091

01137     int32               iCCprofileSize;

01145 
01146
